title: 98/657/EC: Commission Decision of 12 November 1998 adopting the plan allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1999 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community (notified under document number C(1998) 3485)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 November 1998 adopting the plan allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1999 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community (notified under document number C(1998) 3485) (98/657/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1999 financial year, foodstuffs for distribution to the most deprived persons in the Community, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3730/87, shall be supplied in accordance with the annual distribution plan set out in Annex I.
The intra-Community transfer operations listed in Annex II are hereby authorised.
The amounts in ecus shall be converted into national currencies using the rates applicable on 1 October 1998 and published in the C series of the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 November 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
